data.title: Hotshots Sports Bar & Grill
data.meta_description: Hotshots Sports Bar & Grill located at 950 S Highway Dr in Fenton, MO is the perfect place to meet with friends and enjoy great food, great beers, and great times.
data.text:
Open daily for dine-in, pickup and delivery service

Located off Exit I-44 at Bowles Ave- West on South Highway Dr., Hotshots Sports Bar & Grill in Fenton, MO is the perfect place to meet with friends and enjoy great food and cold beer.

MIX & MATCH BUCKETS

$18 Mix & Match Buckets from 6pm to Close

BEER OF THE MONTH

Ask about our Beer of the Month Pint & Macho Mug Special

Happy Hour

Join us for happy hour from 3pm until 6pm. Get “The Big 3″ – Hotshots MVP burger, 9” pizza or 6 boneless wings for only $4/ea. Dine in only, ask your server for details.

Bud Family Pint Night

$3.25 Bud Family Pints & $2 Rootbeer Barrels from 6pm to Close

BEER OF THE MONTH

Ask about our Beer of the Month Pint & Macho Mug Special

Happy Hour

Join us for happy hour from 3pm until 6pm. Get “The Big 3″ – Hotshots MVP burger, 9” pizza or 6 boneless wings for only $4/ea. Dine in only, ask your server for details.

Macho Mug Night

$5 Domestic Macho Mug from 6pm to Close

BEER OF THE MONTH

Ask about our Beer of the Month Pint & Macho Mug Special

Happy Hour

Join us for happy hour from 3pm until 6pm. Get “The Big 3″ – Hotshots MVP burger, 9” pizza or 6 boneless wings for only $4/ea. Dine in only, ask your server for details.
